backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user auth, print job submission with serial tracking, and per-user label settings using maps and access control.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App bootstrap wiring password session provider, error boundary, and lock screen vs main shell rendering.
frontend/src/audio/soundSystem.ts: Zustand‑based sound settings store plus Web Audio beep and sequence playback utilities.
frontend/src/auth/passwordSession.ts: LocalStorage‑persisted password session creation, validation, expiry checks, and expected password comparison.
frontend/src/auth/PasswordSessionProvide: Context provider managing password session lifecycle with unlock/lock and validation against expected password.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main UI shell with header, lock button, tab navigation, and routed tab content for core features.
frontend/src/components/BackendAvailabil: Shows a destructive badge when the backend is unavailable using store state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that logs errors and displays a fallback UI or custom fallback component.
frontend/src/components/HeaderDeviceCont: Displays printer connection status and a wake‑lock toggle if supported.
frontend/src/components/SerialTypeCounte: Renders print counters per prefix mapping with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/config/lockScreenConfig.ts: Provides lock‑screen password logic with environment override.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, stored identity loading, and context management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting print jobs, fetching history, and increasing counts with backend availability handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Manages screen wake‑lock state with persistence and visibility re‑request logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with a dark warehouse theme, accessibility settings, and component defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/printing/barcodePreview.ts: Creates a simple deterministic barcode SVG by converting characters into bar patterns and assembling them into an SVG string.
frontend/src/printing/cpclGenerator.ts: Builds CPCL command strings for test prints and customizable labels using layout settings and serial data.
frontend/src/printing/LabelPreview.tsx: Interactive label preview with zoom, sample serial inputs, layout conversion, and barcode rendering.
frontend/src/screens/LockScreen.tsx: Provides a password-based lock screen UI that validates input, shows errors, and triggers session unlock.
frontend/src/screens/PasswordSessionWiri: Displays an error screen explaining misconfiguration of the password session system with refresh guidance.
frontend/src/services/printerService.ts: Manages printer connection state, USB/Bluetooth setup, CPCL sending, and test prints via a Zustand store.
frontend/src/services/usbCpclTransport.t: Implements WebUSB-based discovery, connection, and data transfer for CPCL-compatible USB printers.
frontend/src/state/backendAvailabilitySt: Tracks backend availability, success/error timestamps, and provides actions to update or reset the state.
frontend/src/state/diagnosticsStore.ts: Maintains scan/print/error counters and per-type statistics with persistent storage through Zustand.
frontend/src/state/labelSettingsStore.ts: Zustand store managing label settings with BigInt‑safe persistence, default layouts, and migration from older formats.
frontend/src/state/logStore.ts: Zustand‑based persistent log store that records timestamped log entries and keeps the latest 500.
frontend/src/state/printHistoryStore.ts: Persistent print history store with reprint support using saved CPCL and logging of outcomes.
frontend/src/tabs/DevicesTab.tsx: UI tab for connecting to printers via Bluetooth or USB, showing connection status and allowing test prints.
frontend/src/tabs/DiagnosticsTab.tsx: Diagnostics interface displaying stats, print history with reprint, logs, and sound settings.
frontend/src/tabs/LabelSettingsTab.tsx: Editor UI for label configuration including dimensions, prefix mappings, element layout, and import/export.
frontend/src/tabs/ScanPrintTab.tsx: Scan-and-print workflow handling serial validation, prefix detection, CPCL generation, printing, and diagnostics updates.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Helpers to detect and describe IC0508 'canister is stopped' errors from Internet Computer operations.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsErrors.t: Provides a parser that converts raw label settings update errors into user-friendly messages, handling canister, auth, network, duplicate, and prefix errors.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsImportEx: Handles exporting label settings with BigInt-safe JSON and importing/migrating old or new formats with validations and layout generation.
frontend/src/utils/labelTypes.ts: Defines built-in label types and utilities for deriving display names, extracting custom types, and producing a merged sorted list of all label types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-based routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes project state, architecture, issues, and features for the barcode and label printing system.
